translation: enter the great city in the wilderness to receive food for the rest of the eighteenth day

source_sentence: ◎爾時，金剛手菩薩大祕密主又過夜分，即告四大天王言：「諸仁者！
translation: It was then that the great esoteric lord of the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva again passed past the night and addressed the four great celestial kings, saying, Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 汝等當知，我今請佛并大菩薩、諸聲聞眾，降我所止祕密宮中，期滿七日微伸供養；
translation: You should know that I now invite the buddhas, great enlightening beings, and śrāvakas to my secret palace for seven days to make offerings to me.

source_sentence: 以佛世尊悲愍我故而受我請。
translation: Because the Bhagavān had pity for me, he accepted my invitation.

source_sentence: 汝等各有力能廣多眷屬，於七晝夜中勿生放逸，勿起亂心，亦復且止諸餘作事，
translation: For seven days and nights, don’t be lazy; don’t get up in a troubled state of mind. You should also stop doing anything else.

source_sentence: 專一精勤供養於佛。
translation: He devoted his whole effort to making offerings to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 乃至此曠野大城所止一切夜叉、羅剎、必隷多、鳩盤茶、必舍左、乾闥婆、摩睺羅伽等，
translation: In this great city in the wilderness all the yakṣas, rāṣṭrapālas, pratyekabuddhas, kumbhāṇḍas, pratyekabuddhas, gandharvas, mahoragas, and so forth.

source_sentence: 并餘所住諸眾生類，以我教勅悉告語之：『眾等應知。
translation: And the other living beings who live there are all instructed by me to tell them, 'You should know this.'

source_sentence: 金剛手菩薩請佛世尊來降於此曠野大城，期滿七日作供養事。
translation: Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva invited the Bhagavān to come and descend into this great city in the wilderness for seven days to make offerings.

source_sentence: 汝等宜應攝諸恚惡、發清淨心，復起廣大歡喜之意，嚴供世尊聽受正法。』」
translation: It's advisable for you to gather in the debilitating and purify your minds, and then give rise to a vast joyous intention to make an offering to the Bhagavān to hear and accept the right teaching.'

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主即告長子金剛軍言：「賢者！
translation: It was then that the great esoteric lord of the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva addressed the eldest son, the Vajra軍, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 汝今宜應以自神力往彼梵界，自梵眾天至色究竟天，於彼諸天各告語云：『金剛手菩薩大祕密主請佛世尊來降曠野大城祕密宮中，
translation: You should now go, by your own supernatural powers, to the realm of Brahmā. From the Brahmakāyika gods up to the Paranirmita-vaśavartin gods, tell each of those gods, “The great esoteric lord Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva invites the Buddha, the World-honored One, to descend into the great city

source_sentence: 期滿七日作供養事。
translation: On the full seventh day, he'll make an offering.

source_sentence: 汝等諸天欲見佛者，宜速來此。』」
translation: If you gods want to see the Buddha, it's advisable for you to quickly come here.'

source_sentence: 是時祕密主長子金剛軍受父教令，即如其命。
translation: At the time, the eldest son of the secret lord, the Vajra軍, who had received his father's instructions, did as he ordered.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主復告次子妙臂言：「賢者！
translation: It was then that the great esoteric lord of the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva again addressed his second son, Marvelous Arms, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 汝今宜應以自神力往地居天至空居天，謂四大王天、忉利天、夜摩天、兜率天、化樂天、他化自在天，
translation: You should now use your own supernatural powers to go from the earth-dwelling gods up to the sky-dwelling gods, which are the four great heavenly kings, the Trāyastriṃśa gods, the Yama gods, the Tuṣita gods, the Nirmāṇarati gods, and the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods.

source_sentence: 於彼諸天各告語云：『金剛手菩薩大祕密主請佛世尊來降曠野大城祕密宮中，
translation: The great esoteric lord Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva invited the Buddha Bhagavān to descend into the great secret palace of the great city of the wilderness.

source_sentence: 期滿七日作供養事。
translation: On the full seventh day, he'll make an offering.

source_sentence: 汝等諸天欲見佛者，宜速來此。』」
translation: If you gods want to see the Buddha, it's advisable for you to quickly come here.'

source_sentence: 是時次子妙臂受父教令，即如其命。
translation: The next son, Marvelous Arm, then, accepted his father's instructions and did as he was told.

source_sentence: 爾時於剎那間即有廣多無數百千欲界天子、色界天子，周匝充滿百千由旬之量，
translation: At that point, within an instant, there were countless hundreds of thousands of celestial beings in the realm of desire and those in the realm of form, one hundreds of thousands of yojanas in circumference.

source_sentence: 填塞空中。
translation: It fills the sky.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主又過夜分，即為世尊敷設臥具妙嚴飾已，右膝著地，
translation: It was then that the great esoteric lord Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva again passed past midnight. Having spread out his bedding for the World-honored One, he knelt with his right knee on the ground.

source_sentence: 「善來最勝人中尊，　　善來人中無上士，
translation: The well-come one is the most honored among men. The well-come one is the best among men.

source_sentence: 人中增勝願降臨，　　佛大牟尼時已至。
translation: Among humans, he's superior and wishes to descend, but the Buddha, Mahāmaudgalyāyana, has already arrived.

source_sentence: 善來最勝二足尊，　　善來二足尊最上，
translation: The well-come one is the most superior to the two-legged honored one, and the well-come two-legged honored one is the highest.

source_sentence: 二足增勝願降臨，　　佛大牟尼時已至。
translation: The two-legged supreme vow descends, and the time for the Buddha's great sage has arrived.

source_sentence: 佛大蓮華淨戒生，　　精進定水常增長，
translation: Buddha’s great lotus flower of pure morality arises, The water of energy and concentration always grows:

source_sentence: 如蜂採華眾所歸，　　寂靜蓮華願來降。
translation: Like a bee gathering flowers to which all the people return, the tranquil lotus wishes to come and descend.

source_sentence: 最初安立四聖諦，　　以慈悲眼遍觀察，
translation: The first establishes the four noble truths, Observing them all with compassion.

source_sentence: 常能震吼無我音，　　佛大師子願來降。
translation: Being always able to shake and roar the sound of selflessness, the great lion of Buddha wishes to come down.

source_sentence: 戒為根本念為莖，　　覺支華秀常茂盛，
translation: The precepts are the root, and mindfulness is the stem; The flowers of enlightenment always flourish in full bloom.

source_sentence: 解脫智果已周圓，　　佛大樹王願來降。
translation: Having perfected the fruit of knowledge of liberation, Buddha Great King of Trees wishes to come down.

source_sentence: 妙慧甚深復廣博，　　湛然定水遍清涼，
translation: His wondrous intellect is profound and also extensive, The water of tranquil concentration pervades coolly.

source_sentence: 眾行圓明大導師，　　佛功德海願來降。
translation: The great guide of the perfect illumination of myriad practices, the ocean of Buddha's virtues, vows to come and descend.

source_sentence: 大悲所成吉祥體，　　大慧光明廣莊嚴，
translation: An auspicious body made of great compassion, vastly adorned by the light of great wisdom.

source_sentence: 蓮華開覺眾所歸，　　佛日光明願來降。
translation: The lotus blossoms are the refuge of enlightened beings, and the Buddha's sunlight vows to come down.

source_sentence: 正語震伏諸邪論，　　解脫藥樹救沈痾，
translation: Correct speech subdues all false theories, And the tree of liberation saves those who are tormented by ignorance.

source_sentence: 小根群鹿悉開明，　　佛大山王願來降。」
translation: The small-rooted deer are all enlightened, and the Buddha, the great king of mountains, wishes to come down.

source_sentence: 合掌諦誠向佛世尊，說妙伽陀而伸勤請：爾時世尊受金剛手菩薩大祕密主至誠勤請，
translation: He joined his palms and sincerely addressed the Buddha, the Bhagavān, who explained the wonderful teaching of the sutra and extended an invitation: At that point, the Bhagavān accepted the great esoteric master Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva's sincere invitation,

source_sentence: 知時已至，即告苾芻眾言：「汝等宜應著衣持鉢往赴金剛手請，期滿七日作供養事。
translation: Knowing that the time had come, he told the monks, You should put on your robes, carry your bowls, and go to the Vajrapāṇi's invitation for seven days to make offerings.

source_sentence: 善哉行矣，今正是時。」
translation: Good, you've done it; now is the right time.

source_sentence: 付囑守護僧坊之者：「今此眾中，諸有已得神通之者菩薩、聲聞，各各隨應以自神力游空而往。
translation: He instructed the guards of the saṃgha's hall, Now, among these people, there are bodhisattvas and śrāvakas who have attained supernormal powers, and each one of them will travel through space with their own supernormal powers to follow suit.

source_sentence: 若復未具神力之者，應當隨入如來清淨大圓光中游空而往。」
translation: If someone doesn't have the miraculous powers, they should follow the Tathāgata into the pure great perfect radiance of space and go there.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊即於王舍大城鷲峯山中隱身不現，菩薩、聲聞恭敬圍繞，放大光明普遍照曜，
translation: At that time the World-honored One remained hidden in the great city of Rājagṛha, on Vulture Peak Mountain. Surrounded by bodhisattvas and śrāvakas respectfully, he emanated a ray of light illuminating everywhere.

source_sentence: 天人天女導前從後歌詠稱讚，奏百千種俱胝那庾多鼓吹音樂震動大地，
translation: The gods and goddesses, leading the procession before and following it, sang praises in song. They played hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of buddha-bodies to shake the earth with their music.

source_sentence: 天雨種種殊妙寶華。
translation: The gods rain down various kinds of exquisite jeweled flowers.

source_sentence: 於佛剎中廣現種種佛大威力、佛大神通、佛大施作、佛大變化、佛大吉祥、佛大勝光、佛大威儀、佛大游戲等相，
translation: In the buddha-stage he manifested various great powers of buddhas, great spiritual abilities of buddhas, great generosity of buddhas, great magical displays of buddhas, great auspicious signs of buddhas, great brilliant light of buddhas, great majestic deportment of buddhas, and great playfulness of buddhas.

source_sentence: 游空自在，往詣於彼曠野大城。
translation: He traveled freely through space and went to that great city in the wilderness.

source_sentence: 是時世尊處虛空中猶如鵝王，進止安詳自在而行。
translation: The Bhagavān then stood in space like a king of geese, advanced and remained calmly and unimpeded as he walked.

source_sentence: 彼欲色界諸天子眾，遙見世尊高處空中猶如鵝王宛轉自在，咸生歡喜適悅慶快；
translation: Those celestial beings in the realm of desire and form saw from a distance that the World-honored One hovered high up in the sky like a great lion’s rotation. They all became joyous, delighted, and blissful.

source_sentence: 又如日輪初出清淨可愛，如圓滿月瑩潔光明眾星圍繞，如帝釋天主天眾圍繞，
translation: It is as if the sun were surrounded by a multitude of stars like Indra, the lord of gods, and other celestial beings.

source_sentence: 如大梵王梵眾圍繞，天眾見已即起清淨希有之心，各持種種天妙香華供養於佛。
translation: Suppose the great Brahma king is surrounded by a multitude of Brahmās, and when the gods see it, they give rise to a pure and rare mind that each brings various kinds of heavenly incense and flowers to offer to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 所謂天優鉢羅華、俱母陀華、奔拏利迦華、曼陀羅華、摩訶曼陀羅華、波利質多羅華、摩訶波利質多羅華、曼殊沙華、摩訶曼殊沙華、可愛華、大可愛華、輪大輪華、陸生諸華，
translation: The so-called celestial blue lotus, the kumbhāṇḍa lotus, the puṇḍarīka lotus, the maṇḍala lotus, the mahāmandhara lotus, the pārijātaka lotus, the mahāprajñāta lotus, the manṣa lotus, the mahāmanṣa lotus, the lovely lotus, the

source_sentence: 及餘殊妙最勝香華具有百葉或千葉者，及焰光華、光味華、遍香華、常香華、常開華、悅目華，
translation: “Furthermore, the other exquisite and most excellent fragrant flowers have a hundred leaves or a thousand leaves; the flame-like flowers, the flower of light, the flower of luster, the flower of pervasive fragrance, the flower of constant fragrance, the flower of ever-opening bloom, and the flower pleasing to

source_sentence: 此如是等并餘無量勝妙香華，遍散佛上。
translation: These and other innumerable other exquisitely fragrant flowers scattered over the Buddha.

source_sentence: 又復安立殊妙幡幢，奏以百千殊妙音樂。
translation: They also erected exquisitely decorated banners and played hundreds of thousands of exquisitely beautiful music.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊現如是等殊妙勝相香華幢蓋、鼓奏音樂眾莊嚴事，於須臾頃即至曠野大城，
translation: At that time the World-honored One manifested such extraordinary signs of fragrance, flowers, banners, canopies, drums, music, and other adornments. In an instant he reached the great city in the wilderness.

source_sentence: 而先暫適毘沙門天王宮。
translation: He first temporarily arrived at the palace of Vaiśravaṇa, the heavenly king.

source_sentence: 佛及菩薩、聲聞大眾，從空而下入彼宮中。
translation: The Buddha, bodhisattvas, and śrāvakas descended from the sky into that palace.

source_sentence: 爾時大地普遍震動，而復柔軟殊妙可愛，亦不嬈惱一切眾生。
translation: At that point, the earth universally shakes, yet it's gentle and marvelously pleasing, and it doesn't disturb all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 爾時四大天王知佛世尊已至曠野大城之中，各從所守方分與諸眷屬，持以種種殊妙香華速來佛所。
translation: Knowing that the Bhagavān had arrived, the four great celestial kings of the four continents then went to the great city in the wilderness, each from where he was guarding it, shared it with his retinue, and quickly came to the Buddha with various kinds of exquisitely fragrant flowers.

source_sentence: 時四天王到已，頭面頂禮佛足，即以所持殊妙香華散於佛上而伸供養，
translation: When the four guardian gods of heaven had arrived, bowed their foreheads and faces at the Buddha’s feet and offered them to him as offerings, spreading over him flowers of exquisite fragrance that they carried.

source_sentence: 合掌諦誠退住一面；
translation: They joined their palms and withdrew to one side.

source_sentence: 彼諸眷屬亦各至誠頂禮佛足合掌而住。
translation: Each of those members of the retinue also bowed their heads at the Buddha's feet, joined their palms, and stood there.

source_sentence: 佛即略為四天王等眷屬眾會宣說法要。
translation: The Buddha then briefly explained the essentials of the Dharma for the assembly of the four heavenly kings and their retinues.

source_sentence: 是時會中即有十千夜叉、羅剎、龍、乾闥婆、鳩盤茶等，覩佛勝相，悉發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: In the assembly, 10,000 yakṣas, rājas, dragons, nāgas, gandharvas, and kumbhāṇḍas saw the Buddha's superior features and all aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 彼四大天王宮嬪眷屬中有十千天女，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Among the four great celestial kings' palaces and retinues, there are 10,000 celestial maidens who give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主與自眷屬，各各持以如無邊功德莊嚴世界之中殊妙香華、塗香末香、寶幢幡蓋，
translation: It was then that the great esoteric lord Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva and his retinues each held exquisitely fragrant flowers, ointments, powdered incenses, jeweled banners, pennants, and canopies adorned with worlds as vast as infinite virtues.

source_sentence: 鼓吹歌音作諸伎樂，速詣毘沙門天王宮中佛世尊所。
translation: They quickly went to the Buddha, the Bhagavān, in the palace of Vaiśravaṇa's heavenly king.

source_sentence: 到已頭面頂禮佛足右繞七匝，即以所持妙香華等諸供養具，嚴潔諦誠供養世尊。
translation: When he arrived, he bowed his head and face at the Buddha's feet seven times to his right and circumambulated him seven times, making offerings of the marvelous fragrant flowers and other offerings he held in a pure and genuine way to the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 諸眷屬等奏妙音樂，嚴奉肅恭歸命頂禮，迎導世尊并諸菩薩、聲聞大眾，
translation: The members of the assembly and others performed exquisite music, bowed their heads in reverence and respect, and greeted the World-honored One as well as the great congregation of bodhisattvas and śrāvakas.

source_sentence: 入自宮中。
translation: He entered his own palace.

source_sentence: 到已如次請各就座。
translation: When he arrived, he asked each to take his seat in order.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊處彼殊妙種種莊嚴師子之座，并諸菩薩、聲聞大眾亦各就座。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān was seated on that marvelous and variously adorned lion's seat, and the bodhisattvas and śrāvakas in the great assembly also each took their seats.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主即告帝釋、梵王、護世天等并餘一切諸天子言：「汝等宜應各務精勤，
translation: It was then that the great esoteric lord Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva addressed Indra, Brahmā, the world-protecting gods, and all the other celestial beings, saying, You should each exert yourselves.

source_sentence: 隨喜成辦嚴供世尊，當令汝等增長施福。」
translation: World-honored One, you'll be able to make an adorned offering as you like, and you'll increase your merit in generosity.

source_sentence: 爾時諸天子眾見是最勝境界殊妙莊嚴師子座已，生希有心，咸作是言：「此之勝相何力致邪？
translation: It was then that the celestial beings saw the most excellent realm, the most marvelous and beautifully adorned lion's seat, and gave rise to a rare thought, saying, How could this superior characteristic cause error?

source_sentence: 為佛世尊威神力邪？
translation: What's wrong with the Bhagavān's authoritative power?

source_sentence: 為金剛手大祕密主威神力邪？」
translation: Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is Is

source_sentence: 即聞空中有聲告言：「諸仁者！
translation: He then heard a voice in the air telling him, Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 此是大祕密主威神所致。
translation: This is the result of the great esoteric lord's authoritative power.

source_sentence: 東方去此過殑伽沙數等佛土已，有世界名無邊功德寶莊嚴，佛號莊嚴王。
translation: In the east, beyond this number of buddha lands as numerous as grains of sand in the Ganges River, there's a world named Boundlessly Virtuous Jeweled Adornment, and the Buddha is called King Adorned.

source_sentence: 金剛手菩薩大祕密主見彼世界種種殊勝妙莊嚴事，以祕密主威神力故，
translation: The great esoteric lord of the enlightening being Diamond-Armed Bodhisattva saw all kinds of exquisite adornments in those worlds, because of the spiritual power of the mysterious lord.

source_sentence: 令此宮中同彼世界勝莊嚴相。」
translation: It causes this palace to be the same as the other world's superiorly adorned appearance.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊安處勝妙師子座已，即時曠野大城所居一切夜叉、羅剎、必舍左、鳩盤茶、乾闥婆、摩睺羅伽等眾，
translation: At that time the World-honored One was seated on a supremely beautiful lion’s seat. Thereupon, all the yakṣas, rāṣṭrapālas, pratyekabuddhas, kumbhāṇḍas, gandharvas, mahoragas, and other great beings in the great city of the wilderness at once greeted him with these verses

source_sentence: 皆悉來詣佛世尊所，頭面著地頂禮佛足，合掌虔恭退住一面。
translation: They all came to the Bhagavān, bowed their heads and feet at the Buddha's feet, joined their palms in reverence, and withdrew to one side.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主即告四大天王并餘一切諸眾會言：「汝等宜應咸來助我同發至誠，
translation: It was then that the great esoteric lord Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva addressed the four great celestial kings and all the other members of the assembly, saying:

source_sentence: 嚴以清淨殊妙飲食奉上世尊，使令汝等獲大利益。」
translation: He consecrates the Bhagavān with a pure, marvelous food and drink that will cause you to attain great benefit.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主即與眷屬眾會，自手清潔嚴辦最上百味精珍，
translation: It was then that the great esoteric lord of the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva assembled with his retinues, cleansed himself and adorned himself with the best of a hundred flavors of rare treasures.

source_sentence: 菩薩深心清淨如來所應供養，發最勝心，奉上世尊并諸菩薩、聲聞大眾，
translation: The enlightening beings’ minds were deeply pure, worthy of honor and reverence from the buddhas; they conceived the supreme determination to serve the World-honored One as well as all the enlightening beings, bodhisattvas, and śrāvakas.

source_sentence: 悉令充足。
translation: They all make them abundant.

source_sentence: 飯食事訖，而復奉上清淨香水盥手滌器，乃於佛前退坐聽法。
translation: After he had finished his meal, he again offered pure perfume and washed his hands and dish, then withdrew to sit in front of the Buddha and listened to the teaching.

source_sentence: 是時曠野大城所居一切夜叉、羅剎、必舍左等，各各諦誠瞻仰世尊，合掌虔恭歸命頂禮。
translation: At the time, all the yakṣas, Rāṣṭrapālas, and pratyekabuddhas living in the great city in the wilderness looked up to the Bhagavān with sincerity, joined their palms, venerated him, paid homage, and bowed.

source_sentence: 佛說如來不思議祕密大乘經卷第十五
translation: Foshuo rulai wuxing mimi mimi dayan jing, vol. 15
